CodeBeamer 7.4.0
Service Layer and Remote API Specification

Service Layer 
Package Description
com.intland.codebeamer.manager  
com.intland.codebeamer.manager.util

Remote API 
Package Description
com.intland.codebeamer.remoting
Provides a web service based Remote API for external clients to interact with CodeBeamer's internal resources.
com.intland.codebeamer.remoting.bean
Special entity classes for the Remote API.
